title: Monthly consumer Price Index ( CPI ) in India July 2019
summary: As of June in 2019 , there was a All number of 142.9 Monthly consumer of Price ( COVID-19 ) in India , Urban 142.1 showing some Urban .
Additional to this number , 705 passengers on the cruise ship Diamond Princess docked in Yokohama , Kanagawa Prefecture , were diagnosed positive Urban the virus so far .
According to the source , all the passengers and crews got off the ship India June 1 .
gold: The Consumer Price Index across India was 142.9 as of June 2019 . This means that the price index has increased by about 42.9 percent since the year 2012 . The index for urban and rural regions differed by about 1.5 percent in the stated time period .
